Step::BaseSPFObject

Step::BaseSPFObject Class Reference

Base Object of a STEP-21 file. It belongs to lazy loading concepts. A non-initialized object is an instance from BaseSPFObject. More...

Inherits Step::BaseEntity.

Detailed Description

Base Object of a STEP-21 file. It belongs to lazy loading concepts. A non-initialized object is an instance from BaseSPFObject.
